lyrics:
"Tragedy" lyrics DJ Holiday & Gucci Mane Lyrics "Tragedy" [Gucci Mane:] Lord knows I don't wanna be In the penitentiary But that's my reality That shit might be a tragedy I be right back smoking weed Chilling with the family Cause that's my reality That shit might be a tragedy Starting out my week with a quarter boat Stupid strong and I won't sell a quarter O I got 5 on that cause I'm infamous Fuck fame, strippers love me... "Back to work nigga! I know y'all niggas miss this shit!" Y'all know I don't wanna be In a penitentiary But that's my reality That shit might be a tragedy I be right back smoking weed Chilling with the family Cause that's my reality That shit might be a tragedy Starting out my week with a quarter boat Stupid strong and I won't sell a quarter O I got 5-0 mad cause I'm infamous Fuck fame, strippers love me ask Infamous Fuck no, I ain't working for the minimum I'm going in, every weekend is a cinema So get a Coke, hot dog and some candy bars I'm from the 6 but my dick dunn been in movie stars I'm so high right now I want to buy the bar Let everybody in free I'm bringing all my cars And I don't wanna be locked up, hell no! But we got weight so really wanna sell dope Y'all know I don't wanna be In a penitentiary But that's my reality That shit might be a tragedy I be right back smoking weed Chilling with the family Cause that's my reality That shit might be a tragedy Excuse me for being gangsta, I'm crazy I couldn't have been a sissy Mama wouldn't have fed me I'm all-red and my Beemer confetti I'm reminiscing 18 with the Chevy I'm deadlift with a tool like Freddy Not Jackson, Kruger, you smell me? And no push ups, just kush up No lay-ups, just caked up E A G A got bakers Eastside, can I roll through Decatur I'm going hard for the squad I'm the major Anything move here, Gucci paper if ( /Android|webOS|iPhone|iPod|iPad|BlackBerry|IEMobile|Opera Mini/i.test(navigator.userAgent) ) { document.getElementById('azmxmbanner').style.display='block'; document.write('

'); } Submit Corrections Writer(s): Maurice Ernest Gibb AZLyrics G Gucci Mane Lyrics mixtape: "Writings On The Wall II" (2011) Tragedy Hard On A Bitch Camera Ready Supa Cold Tax Free Scotty Play Your Cards Guilty Two Dope Boys Too Turnt Up MVP MAjor Recently Search
